#summary How to use jSCEP in your own application.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

This page describes how to use jSCEP in your own application.

= Details =

== Dependencies ==

jSCEP depends on the "Provider" and "SMIME/CMS" libraries from the Bouncy Castle project, both of which should be added to your project classpath.  Both libraries can be found on the [http://www.bouncycastle.org/latest_releases.html Bouncy Castle Latest Releases] page.
